product_name: Canari Amidala Bib Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: Enjoy the non-restrictive feeling around your middle when you ride in the women's Amidala Bib Bike Shorts from Canari. You just might see your time improve. Nylon/spandex shorts in 6-panel construction offer compression to reduce muscle fatigue. Contoured bib straps are set wide for a comfortable, women-specific fit; back clip lets you undo the bib top easily and quickly. Exoband compression gripper at leg cuffs offers exceptional comfort mile after mile as it keeps the shorts in place. Canari Queen chamois features 5-layer construction, perforated foam, 4-way-stretch microfiber top and a precision fit for a friction-free ride. Amidala Bib Bike Shorts from Canari feature a 7 in. pro-length inseam.
short_description: Enjoy the non-restrictive feeling around your middle when you ride in the women's Amidala Bib Bike Shorts from Canari. You just might see your time improve.
